attribute-definition.description: Temporary transactionID storage from a re-bill OCAPI call
Payment method is certified to process subscription orders
Mark this YES to allow the consumer to select the billing model for this product, otherwise, the billing model must be set by the Business Manager user and can not be changed by the consumer.

These billing models correspond to the merchant/user-selectable, billing models and are used in a promotion context to apply discounts based on the user's chosen billing model, such as in a Subscribe & Save scenario
Billing Models created in sticky.io
Billing Models created in sticky.io
Billing Models created in sticky.io
The global Site campaign ID from sticky.io
The last time this product had changes and was synced to sticky.io
Offer created in sticky.io
Offer created in sticky.io
Offer created in sticky.io
These Offers correspond to the merchant/user-selectable, Offers and are used in a promotion context to apply discounts based on the user's chosen Offer, such as in a Subscribe & Save scenario
Allow a product to be purchased without a subscription aka "straight sale"
Product ID for a Master or stand-alone Product
These Terms correspond to the merchant/user-selectable, Terms and are used in a promotion context to apply discounts and price changes based on the user's chosen Term such as in a Pre-paid scenario
Pre-paid terms created in sticky.io
Pre-paid terms created in sticky.io
Pre-paid terms created in sticky.io
Mark this YES to allow the consumer to select the prepaid terms for this product, otherwise, the terms will default to the first available in the offer.
Disable product swap
JSON string containing data about image syncing to sticky
This should be automatically populated by sticky.io.
This should be automatically populated by sticky.io.
Raw JSON response of the sticky.io order call
Track if the sticky.io order has been updated with relevant data (tracking number)
sticky.io provided instance domain (example: instance.sticky.io)
Used as part of authorization for Sticky notifications
Used as part of authorization for Sticky Notifications
Require customers to log in before being able to check out with subscription items.
Payment gateway ID provided by sticky.io
Enabling or disabling this service requires communication with your sticky.io rep.
Provide your SFRA major version for keeping the cartridge compatible
Universal product ID to represent all straight-sale items in sticky.io
Allow the consumer to be billed "now" for their subscription
Allow the consumer to pause their subscription
Allow the consumer to manage the recurring date of their subscription
Allow the consumer to reset their subscription
Allow the consumer to stop their subscription - usually not a consumer-facing function
Allow the consumer to stop their subscription after the next rebill
Allow the consumer to change the billing model of their subscription
Send customer email if subscription is paused
Send customer email if subscription is canceled
Send customer email if rebill is declined.
Send customer email if credit card associated with subscription is expired
Prior number of Days to send reminder email notifications (1 day out, 5 days out, 15 days out)
Send customer subscription reminder email.
Internal object to map different currencies with the proper sticky's gateways
Create groups of products allowed to be swapped.
